name: places/ChIJU2OVqQP2wokRxgkZx3f5BBo
adrFormatAddress: 1930 3rd Ave, New York, NY 10029-4006, USA

editorialSummary.text: Wireless provider supplying phones, tablets & accessories, plus cell phone & device data plans.

originalText.text: I went to this location on December 19,2020 to purchase an iPhone for my son for Christmas. For one it took up to 2 hours for some reason to get everything up and running. Next the guy said my son can keep his previous number but he also took my Identification so the plan is in my name. Then he threw in some perks like a charger and speaker. I was appreciative honestly. About 2 weeks later realized the phone plan changed and the name on the account is Larry Jones and I was locked out of the account altogether. I called up Metro PCs they could now assist me in anyway and advised I go to a Metro PCs or back to that store.. I avoided the store period. Don’t mess with these people because they are fraudulent people..

originalText.text: Do NOT go here! They just want to make you spend so that they look good to metro as "good salespeople" and only work for their commissions to look good.

text.text: Do NOT go here! They just want to make you spend so that they look good to metro as "good salespeople" and only work for their commissions to look good.

originalText.text:
I went here to switch plans from boost to metro I needed three lines transfered  this man told me 170 a line for free phone I asked for a break down and this man didn't even know what to say I asked the woman next to him she didn't no how to explain it they tried to gas light us and say the main base of metro would only do it for 140
So wrong Lexington in 115 did it 90 a line and these people explained everything and they let me know 170 is them trying to get more money off us don't come to this metro !!!

originalText.text: Takes the time to provide good service to the community. I've visited on multiple occasions, upgraded, and purchased more than one phone from this location.

originalText.text: good customer service, guy transfer all my apps all my pictures and contacts, it was there closing time but then also employ work over closing time and help me in getting new phone , he save me. love to go this store again after.
